headline: The Allstate Foundation Commits $5 Million to Address the Immediate Needs of Relationship Abuse Survivors
summary: NORTHBROOK, Ill., November 13, 2025--The Allstate Foundation is providing $5 million in funding to the National Domestic Violence Hotline and FreeFrom. These transformative grants will support survivors' immediate needs: emergency crisis support and cash assistance to reach safety. The Allstate Foundation has contributed more than $100 million to disrupt the cycle and reduce the prevalence of relationship abuse over the past 20 years, including $9 million to organizations in the domestic violenc
